name: Sir Meowsalot
bio: Greetings, my liege. I am Sir Meowsalot, defender of the KittyVerse, upholder of justice, and keeper of the cardboard box. I am the sworn champion of cat collectors from every corner of Catelot. With my claw-sharp sword in my paws, no monster can stop me––not even the * hiss * dread troll Grentail.
